body_html:
I'm not sure whether this is a nvcc bug or not.

So far I've found 2 ways to fix this.

  1. Add explicit this, i.e. const int input_size = this->InputSize();.
  2. Add a non-templated member function:
template <...>
class ... {
  int InputSize() const {
    return InputSize(); // No need for "this->" here.
  }
  template <typename T>
  bool DoRunWithType() {
    const int input_size = InputSize(); // Now it works.
    ...
  }
}
